# âš¡ BlitzBoom Game Editor

ğŸš€ **Build 2D games faster than ever.**  
BlitzBoom is a next-gen 2D game editor designed for speed, simplicity, and creativity. Featuring **drag-and-drop editing**, **visual scripting**, and instant game previews, it makes game creation as fun as playing.  

ğŸ‘‰ **Try it now:** [Run BlitzBoom Game Editor](https://blitzboom-game-engine-last-update-v1-12-992057641660.us-west1.run.app/)

## ğŸ’» Run Locally

**Prerequisites:** [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/)  

1. Install dependencies:  
   ```bash
   npm install
Set your Gemini API key in .env.local:

ini
Copy code
GEMINI_API_KEY=your_api_key_here
Start the app:

bash
Copy code
npm run dev
